string-array.name: practice_sentences
string-array.item: The husband of the beautiful woman bought her roses and candy for her birthday.
The reporter had dinner yesterday with the baseball player who Kevin admired.
The mother of the prisoner sent him packages that contained cookies and novels.
Maya played with the blocks and the balls, but she soon got bored with them.
The therapist set up a meeting with the upset woman and her husband yesterday.
The patient who the doctor treated became better after only a few treatments.
The visitors at the zoo watched the zookeeper who the monkeys and apes teased.
The semester will start next week, but the students and teachers are not ready.

string-array.name: practice_questions
string-array.item: Did the reporter have dinner with Kevin?
Did the mother send packages to the prisoner?
Did Maya play with the blocks?
